posts.title: Brave Enough to Take the Next Step: A Tale of Mentoring at the Library
posts.text: When Gesille began her career 17 years ago, she thought it would be great to have someone to talk to about work challenges. She found that and more at the Library.

posts.title: From Good to Great: A Tale of Mentoring at the Library
posts.text: After weeks of brooding over the curriculum for Mentoring at the Library, I’ve finally landed on the theme for the first month of the program: “What does it mean to tell a great story?” This theme is perfect! After all, the Library is full of great stories and people who have great stories to tell.
